item.title: Set up a Basic Leader/Follower Redis Cluster Locally using Docker
item.description: In general, you will want to keep your development environment and your higher environments as similar as makes sense [times it doesn't make sense: when it costs too much], to catch bugs early and often. Here, we'll quickly run through how to set up a leader/follower topology for redis using docker/docker-compose on your local machine.
